name: human
description: A RuneScape 2 inspired humanoid, T-Pose, no weapons
detailedPrompt: A humanoid character inspired by RuneScape 2007, standing in T-pose. The character should have distinct, low-poly geometry with stylized textures mimicking the simplistic, cartoony aesthetic of the game. The skin texture should have a flat, matte finish with muted colors, while the hair should be textured with basic, solid colors. The character should not wield any weapons. The eyes should be round and simple, expressing the iconic RuneScape 2 feel.
